summary_detail.value: The Lincoln County Sheriff has issued a pre-evacuation warning for all zones in the West Kootenai area. There is a good probability of a need to evacuate. It is recommended to move any people requiring extraordinary care, large mobile property, and livestock (if feasible and deemed necessary). Beginning Saturday morning (9/2/2017), Law Enforcement will be going door to door throughout the West Kootenai to insure all residents are aware of the Pre-Evacuation

title: PRE-EVACUATION WARNING (Caribou Fire Wildfire)
summary: The Lincoln County Sheriff has issued a pre-evacuation warning for all zones in the West Kootenai area. There is a good probability of a need to evacuate. Beginning Saturday morning (9/2/2017), Law Enforcement will be going door to door throughout the West Kootenai to insure all residents are aware of the Pre-Evacuation
